easiercrafting.error.removepotions: Remove the wrong ingredient from the brewing stand first
easiercrafting.config.hidewithrei: Hide GUI when REI is shown
easiercrafting.config.tt.autoupdate: Update recipe list after this many seconds after last click
easiercrafting.config.tt.autofocus: Automatically focus the search box when opening craft GUI
easiercrafting.config.tt.allowinternalbu: Allow opening the MC internal recipe book (since 1.12)
easiercrafting.config.tt.guiright: Show the GUI right of the inventory, where it could conflict with Just Enough Items, instead of left, where it conflicts with active buffs
easiercrafting.config.tt.specialrecipes: Add Shulker box coloring, tipped arrows, fireworks, repairs to the craftable list
easiercrafting.config.tt.maxenchants: Don't consider items for workbench repair if they have more than this number of enchants
easiercrafting.config.tt.categorize: Categorize recipes by their creative mode tab
easiercrafting.config.tt.hidewithrei: If you have REI, EasierCrafting will only show when REI is turned off (default CTRL-O)
easiercrafting.config.tt.hidebrewingstan: Hide the TAKE button that conflicts with some resource packs
